scripts.preview: turbo build --filter=./packages/* && npm run preview -w demo-store
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit && npm run typecheck -w demo-store && npm run typecheck -w @shopify/cli-h2-test
scripts.version: changeset version && node -p "'export const LIB_VERSION = \'' + require('./packages/hydrogen/package.json').version + '\';'" > packages/hydrogen/src/version.ts
scripts.clean-all: rimraf node_modules/.bin && rimraf node_modules/.cache && rimraf packages/remix-oxygen/dist && rimraf packages/hydrogen/dist && rimraf packages/hydrogen-remix/dist && rimraf packages/cli/dist && rimraf templates/demo-store/.cache && rimraf templates/demo-store/.hydrogen
